name: Desert Dream (The Real Pi Man)
description:
Made for Brackey's Game Jam 2022.1.  Like my previous submissions this game has been built using my custom game engine PiE.

wander around a procedurally generated desert collecting water bottles.  Stop by an oasis to refill your water, but watch out, not everything is as it looks.

WASD to move, I/K to increase/decrease mouse sensitivity, ESC to pause/play

click on "Start!" to begin game

when you reach 0% water it's Game Over!  (close and relaunch the game to try again)
